SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.math.vector

Class Vector2

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.math.vector.Vector2
All Implemented Interfaces:
Number, Vector
public class Vector2 extends Object implements Vector

Vector2

Represents a two-dimensional vector with x and y components. This class provides methods for vector arithmetic, magnitude calculations, and conversions.

      public double magnitude2()
      Description copied from interface: Vector

    • normalize

      @Nonnull public Vector2 normalize()
      Description copied from interface: Vector
      Returns a normalized vector. If the magnitude is 0, this will return a vector with no direction or magnitude. (a vector where all component values are zero)
      Specified by:
      normalize in interface Vector
      Returns:
      A normalized vector.

      Parameters:
